comments.author: dragonvslinux
comments.body: Quote from: Ucy on June 30, 2022, 03:51:54 PMIf yes, do you want it to move up from now onward?I want to see how many people want a strong upward movement.Although I see a strong rebound as inevitable with the coming weeks or months (even with further downside), I'm still happy to accumulate around current prices. I'd actually prefer price to consolidate between $20K and $30K for a 3-6 months for further accumulation and in order to more likely confirm a bottom and return to $40K to $50K levels, as part of a bear market dead cat bounce. If price reverses too soon it's much more likely to get rejected by $30K previous support and fall much lower than $17.5K I fear.I think many people here are otherwise still hoping for $14K, $12K and $10K levels, even if their not necessarily waiting for these potential lows. But personally I'd be very cautious if price came down to $10K, as it could very well stay below $20K for multiple years if this occurs. It would invalidate a lot of strong Bitcoin 12 year long bull market models such as log growth, that could lead to a much longer bear market.

comments.body: Everyone wants the market to go up because only then will the estimated value of their investment increase. So far the bear market is still hitting and the market has not recovered, this is an opportunity that people can use as an opportunity to buy.I'm still expecting a decline, but I don't know how many lows it will hit later "I'm not sure", but basically it's possible.
